Abilities.Textual: auto: [c-blast(1)] when this unit is placed on gc, if you have a «nubatama» vanguard, and the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's, you may pay the cost. if you do, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
Abilities.Visual: [00ff00][b]AUTO[/b][-]: [[b][u][5555ff]C-Blast(1)[-][/u][/b]] When this unit is placed on GC, if you have a «Nubatama» vanguard, and the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
